title: Systematic Aesthetic Learning Design in Performing Arts: Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational performing arts theory and appreciation experience
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive environment centered on smartphone-based participation.

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to systematically derive aesthetic value through performance art analysis
Learners enhance aesthetic sensitivity by appreciating performance arts from diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners develop the ability to evaluate the educational value of performance arts using digital tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
